quote: Evil is whatever distracts.  – Franz Kafka
fact: Valentine Tapley from Pike County, Missouri  grew chin whiskers attaining a length of twelve feet six inches from 1860 until his death 1910, protesting Abraham Lincoln`s election to the presidency.

joke: Why does a chicken coop only have two doors? Because if it had four doors it would be a chicken sedan.
